id: #please note that the ID only needs to be uneake in its type and section
Type:
what this random will apply to
possabilitys:
LORD
FACTION
PMC (not yet implemented)
Section:
the section this applies to. for example:
'UPGRADE:sMods:COST'
will move this upgrade into the 'sMods' upgrade from the 'UPGRADE' section as a cost modifier
DataType:
This represents the data transoformation happing for this random.
For example: WEIGHTED_RANDOM:DOUBLE would turn a weighted random into a dobule.
'Value' should have the current input poncuation for each Data Type.
Data Types are:
STRING:DOUBLE		classPath to a 'MemCompressed_Random_Double_Base' class
DOUBLE			a number value
WEIGHTED_RANDOM:DOUBLE	a weighted random equadtion
Value:
this represents the defalt value of a given stat. for randomization of starlords data
values represent:
max:min:target:standard deviation
--not yet compleated-- can also be a single intiger for a normal defalt value.
can also be a script of the 'RandomLoader_CustomRandom' class
